hints.label: cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.title: Structural Error Contraction
hints.content:
6862: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6863: 
6864: Under the same conditions as {prf:ref}`thm-positional-variance-contraction`, the structural error also contracts:
6865: 
6866: $$
6867: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6868: $$
hints.raw_directive:
6859: The positional variance contraction has immediate consequences for the structural error $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6860: 
6861: :::{prf:corollary} Structural Error Contraction
6862: :label: cor-structural-error-contraction
6863: 
6864: Under the same conditions as {prf:ref}`thm-positional-variance-contraction`, the structural error also contracts:
6865: 
6866: $$
6867: \mathbb{E}_{\text{clone}}[V_{\text{struct}}(S'_1, S'_2)] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{struct}}) V_{\text{struct}}(S_1, S_2) + C_{\text{struct}}
6868: $$
6869:

hints.label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
hints.content:
6873: :::{prf:proof}
6874: :label: proof-cor-structural-error-contraction
6875: **Proof.**
6876: 
6877: By {prf:ref}`lem-sx-implies-variance`:
6878: 
6879: $$
6880: V_{\text{struct}} \leq 2(\text{Var}_1(x) + \text{Var}_2(x))
6881: $$
6882: 
6883: where $\text{Var}_k(x) = \frac{1}{k_{\text{alive}}} \sum_{i \in \mathcal{A}(S_k)} \|\delta_{x,k,i}\|^2$.
6884: 
6885: The contraction of $V_{\text{Var},x}$ (which is proportional to the sum of these variances) immediately implies contraction of $V_{\text{struct}}$.
6886: 
6887: The constant $\kappa_{\text{struct}}$ depends on $\kappa_x$ and the relationship between $N$-normalized and $k_{\text{alive}}$-normalized variances.

6883: where $\text{Var}_k(x) = \frac{1}{k_{\text{alive}}} \sum_{i \in \mathcal{A}(S_k)} \|\delta_{x,k,i}\|^2$.
6884:

6886:
